*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James F. Perry, December 14, 1830. Navigation. Galveston must be the principal port. Legislature.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="12-14-1830">14 Decr 1830*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p*I have the satisfaction of acknowledging the receipt of yours of *date_mentioned n="10-02-1830">2d October*/date_mentioned* from *location_mentioned*New York*/location_mentioned*, and of informing you of the safe arrival of the Nelson. I recd a letter *date_mentioned n="12-13-1830">yesterday */date_mentioned*from *person_mentioned*John Austin*/person_mentioned* stating that the Nelson was at *location_mentioned*Brazoria */location_mentioned*and he was then unloading your goods—She lost her false keel coming over the *location_mentioned*bar */location_mentioned*and thumped severely—the *location_mentioned*bar */location_mentioned*is much worse than when you came over—*person_mentioned*Henry Austin*/person_mentioned* came near loosing his Steam boat going out, he put to Sea very much damaged and I have not heard of him since—*/p*
*p*I wrote to *person_mentioned*John */person_mentioned*to follow your instructions strickly as to the goods, and not open them untill *person_mentioned*Mr Hunter*/person_mentioned* arrives. I have not yet finished the *location_mentioned*Store house*/location_mentioned*, it is raised (in this place) the Shingles are hawled— the plank is all sawed and wagons have gone after it—So that I hope it will be ready by the time *person_mentioned*Hunter */person_mentioned*arrives—I have no *location_mentioned*house*/location_mentioned* under way for the *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*—you will get out in the *date_mentioned n="SPring-1831">Spring */date_mentioned*and the weather will be pleasant, and you can get along very well untill some *location_mentioned*buildings */location_mentioned*are put up—*person_mentioned*Emily */person_mentioned*has seen a *location_mentioned*new country*/location_mentioned* in times long past and can manage very well for a month or two—The fact is I have no one to attend to business and if I undertake to build while I am absent it will cost ten prices. My advise is that you build on the *location_mentioned*out lots above *person_mentioned*Williams*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned*; in this place on the creek—-I think the situation a healthy one-*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Edwards */person_mentioned*gets the *location_mentioned*League at the point*/location_mentioned*-—There was no other way of arranging the thing—-The *location_mentioned*tract between the two creeks*/location_mentioned* I think is the best *location_mentioned*Stock farm*/location_mentioned* in the*location_mentioned* lower country,*/location_mentioned* and I am clearly of opinion that Stock is the best business that can be followed, and if you intend to go into that business the *location_mentioned*Clear Creek*/location_mentioned* and *location_mentioned*Dickensons Creek */location_mentioned*is the best tract you can get—I am very anxious for you to be here. We can soon fix ourselves comfortably—the *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*will have to undergo some privations the first year I leave here the *date_mentioned n="12-16-1830">day after tomorrow */date_mentioned*for *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*and shall not be back untill *date_mentioned n="06-xx-1831">June*/date_mentioned*, and I then hope to see you all here in health—. I have left my will with *person_mentioned*S. M. Williams */person_mentioned*and he has a power of attorney to attend to all my business, there is considerable due me and you can get work and plank etc. without paying money Also I wish you to begin collecting cattle due me—I think it will be a good plan to bring a *person_mentioned*mexican family*/person_mentioned* with me from *location_mentioned*Saltillo*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*I have heard nothing from *person_mentioned*Hunter */person_mentioned*and am very uneasy about him—the *location_mentioned*Brazos bar*/location_mentioned* is very dangerous *location_mentioned*Galveston */location_mentioned*must be the *location_mentioned*principal port*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*Call on *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*for any notes due me or all of them—and use any thing of mine as if it was yours without any kind of reserve. If I live through these two years, I am done for the balance of my life with all kind of public matters*/p*
*p*The person who takes this is waiting so I will close by wishing you all a safe journey and good health*/p*
*p*farewell*/p*
*p* *person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mr James F. Perry*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned* Potosi Missouri*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
